overview: From 2025-09-03 to 2025-09-04, ethereum-optimism/specs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 19 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: Wazabie: Focused on preparing for upgrades across multiple Sepolia testnets, opening three PRs (ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops#1182, #1181, #1180) to update Mode, Metal, and Zora from U13 to U16, while also modifying 31 files with 544 additions and 19 deletions. Their work primarily involved documentation, indicating a focus on preparatory and informational updates.

geoknee: Today, geoknee focused on documentation and other work, contributing to the `ethereum-optimism/design-docs` repository with an open PR (#333) to update the calculation for DB growth, and actively participated in code reviews, providing 12 reviews with 11 comments.

chuxinh: Focused on significant data analysis work, adding a new chain analysis output in ethereum-optimism/op-analytics via PR #1740, which involved a substantial change of over 44k lines. This contribution highlights a primary focus on expanding analytical capabilities.
maurelian: No activity today.

nonsense: nonsense focused on significant code changes, modifying 62 files (+1183/-333 lines) across 12 commits, primarily contributing to other work, tests, and bug fixes, with a notable open PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism#17314. Their contributions primarily involved changes to tests and config files, and they provided 6 review comments.
wlawt: Focused on other work and bugfixes, opening PR ethereum-optimism/optimism#17315 and modifying 172 files with 26 commits, primarily touching code and tests.

ccerv1: Focused on bugfix work, resolving a critical issue in ethereum-optimism/Retro-Funding#75 by fixing missing monthly summary metrics from a JSON configuration, demonstrating a focus on data accuracy.
